mapper.insert: insert into gameboard values(#{host}, #{place}, #{content}, SEQ_GAMEBOARD.nextval, #{phone}, #{email} , #{gametitle}, TO_DATE(#{startday},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{endday},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{team_id})
mapper.select: rownum<=10 select * from team where rownum <= 10 and team_id = (select team_id from gameboard where endday = TO_DATE(#{endday},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
